title: res领地插件的问题
author: 丶尘世
txt_content: 我已经是op身份了 但是圈地依然会受到大小的限制 怎么办！

replies.author: 世予予
replies.txt_content: 提示: 作者被禁止或删除 内容自动屏蔽

replies.author: skyliye
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 skyliye 于 2019-6-30 14:39 编辑 

你需要在groups.yml里改掉圈地大小的设置

在maxrange  和minrange里
Residence:
           # Determins if this group can create residences or not.  This option can be overriden with the permissions node 'residence.create'
           CanCreate: true
           # The maximum number of Residences a player can have.
           MaxResidences: 3
           # The maximum number of physical areas a residence can have.
           MaxAreasPerResidence: 2
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MaxEastWest: 2000
           # (Optional) The minimum number of blocks a Residence can be, East to West (X).
           MinEastWest: 3
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MaxNorthSouth: 2000
           # (Optional) The minimum number of blocks a Residence can be, North to South (Z).
           MinNorthSouth: 3
           # The maximum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MaxUpDown: 256
           # (Optional) The minimum number of blocks a Residence can be, High to Low (Y).
           MinUpDown: 3
           # The lowest altitude this group is allowed to protect.
           MinHeight: 0



改成这样就好了

同样使用/resadmin create也可圈地，但是我仍然建议你改掉配置文件，默认的实在是太小了，可能会引起玩家的不满

replies.author: ItsZeroHikari
replies.txt_content:
请使用/resadmin
满意请采纳~
